I paid for this game at before endnotes it was just counter strike. CSGO is graphic wise better. There are glitches that can be exploited. But all games have glitches of your new to this game. You have no idea what hacking really is. If you hack while I'm playing you will be reported. It's a great game there are good players and toxic players. I'm glad for the in game reporting and muting systems. everything is customizable.... from skins to video and sound settings. Skins cost money. Cases to open for a fee.... you will get drops and some skins that way which is free. You can sell your skins. Watch out for scammers you can report them. If you use discord and tell your buddies where people are your cheating and will be reported 👌
